Elevate your web design workflow with the Color Picker Chrome extension â€“ your go-to solution for precise color selection. Seamlessly extract and save colors from any webpage to enhance your design projects effortlessly.

Key Features:

Effortless Color Extraction: Utilize the Eye Dropper feature to easily capture colors from websites.
Color Palette Management: Organize and store your selected colors for quick access and efficient project management.
Clipboard Integration: Copy HEX codes directly to your clipboard for instant use in design applications.

How to Use:

Click the extension icon to activate the Eye Dropper tool.
Select a color on any webpage to capture it instantly.
Access and organize your color palette within the extension popup.
Copy HEX codes effortlessly for seamless integration into your design projects.
Transform your design experience with Color Picker - the must-have tool for web developers and graphic designers seeking precision and efficiency in color selection. Download now for a vibrant and streamlined design process!
